hero.tagline: Some important promotion or news here.
hero.title: SXYA Community Worldwide
hero.text: If you're looking for conversation ideas, we could talk about hobbies, travel, current events, personal goals, pop culture, food, or career. Is there anything in particular that interests you?

member.title: Our Members
member.text: As a close-knit team of friends with diverse talents and a shared passion for event planning, we collaborate to design and organize private parties that are truly one-of-a-kind and unforgettable.
member.note: The list will be updated periodically. Sorting is based on name, role and role count.

procedure.subtitle: How We Works
procedure.title: Event Planning Procedure
procedure.text: We have built various standardized processes to build events that are more reliable and suited for the majority of people in order to make events function more smoothly and efficiently.

1.name: Preliminary Planning
1.description: Develop initial event details, including location, number of participants, date, and time.

2.name: Feedback-based Adjustments
2.description: Ask all members if they choose to participate and make adjustments to satisfy the majority.

3.name: Follow-up and Confirmation
3.description: Follow-up with non-responsive members to ask if they choose to participate and adjust to satisfy the majority

4.name: Event Execution
4.description: Carry out the details that have been agreed upon, such as reservations and confirmation.

5.name: Post-execution Inquiry
5.description: Follow-up with non-responsive members to ask if they choose to participate (without adjusting event details).

6.name: Detail Notification
6.description: Notify all members of the event details and any changes that have been made.
